item.title: Being Calm Can Never Harm Person Effectiveness in Mental Job Performance
item.description: A new study published in Nature Communications on December 17th, 2022 shows that being calm can never harm one’s effectiveness in mental job performance. The study was conducted on a diverse group of individuals, including executives, scientists, and academics to determine whether remaining calm under pressure can lead to better mental job performance. Participants in the study were assessed on their ability to solve complex problems, recall information and think creatively while remaining calm under pressure.
